title: Exploring In-Workplace Learning Strategies of Professional Chefs: Qualitative Research-Based Project

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical competencies and general understanding of vocational education
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, practical project applying chef learning strategies to mathematics concept analysis

learning_goals: Students can describe formal and informal learning processes in workplace settings through mathematical modeling
Students can systematically analyze real-world case data and derive conclusions by applying qualitative research methodologies
Students can visualize learning barriers and facilitators using mathematical frameworks (e.g., graph theory)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
